overview: Amir is in charge of an insurance office. His wife realizes his betrayal and separates, and Amir is not allowed to see his child. A child who is informed of his existence in the struggle of separation. In the eyes of others, Amir has become a disgraceful traitor and is overwhelmed. Strangely, he finds a potion to travel to the past and returns to the night of betrayal with the intention of compensating for his mistake, but ..
title: Seesaw
